summary: ONCE I SECURE MY SEATBELT, IT RIDES UP AROUND MY NECK AND UNDER MY RIGHT ARMPIT WITHIN 5 TO 10 MINUTES.  I HAVE MOVED MY SEAT FORWARD AND BACK, UP AND DOWN AND CHANGED THE BACK TO RECLINE MORE AND LESS.  THE RESULT IS ALWAYS THE SAME!  NO ONLY IS THIS UNCOMFORTABLE AND REQUIRES CONSTANT ADJUSTING, BUT IT CANNOT BE SAFE.
